name: mcp-debug
description: Model Context Protocol inspector with enhanced HTTP streaming and direct connection support
author: Anthropic, PBC (https://anthropic.com) and contributors

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:windows: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev:windows
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.publish-all: npm publish --workspaces --access public && npm publish --access public
